context: 2015 was a pivotal year as Broadcom was acquired by Avago Technologies Limited, creating a major semiconductor powerhouse. The company continued its focus on wireless, networking, broadband, and storage semiconductors. Broadcom had established dominance in Wi-Fi chips (especially for Apple products), networking chips for data centers, and broadband communication solutions. The company sold 17 core semiconductor product lines across wireless, networking, broadband, storage, and industrial markets.
